Reviews.Content: bit surprised arrival hotel shown pictures marriot website example pool outdoors restaurant service nice hotel location amenities described

Reviews.Content: hotel completely remodeled nice awesome pillows breakfast morning nice eat location awesome regards town literally corner walk block

Reviews.Title: “Very nice property-delicious breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: MelissaCassidy
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 night february sea world staff attentive clean maintained beds comfortable didnt morning morning breakfast served own breakfast sandwiches yogurt muffins cereal oatmeal wont leave hungry overall highly recommend staying

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and location in San Diego”
Reviews.Author: samcoronado
Reviews.Content: property holiday inn recently converted fairfield inn fresh top bottom contemporary look bubbling fountains beautiful grounds technology friendly welcoming staff quiet clean local art comfortable beds flat screen tvs ipod docking clock free breakfast choices oatmeal yogurts fresh fruit makeyourown waffles cereals pastries addition table seating communal table power outlets eat check email time gym equipment individual tvs nice pool jacuzzi convenient freeway onramp gas stations blocks fighting traffic start home stay am san diego

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in a Perfect Location.”
Reviews.Author: SHELLYJ
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights december whilst renovations progress despite major lobby corridors fantastic huge comfortable bed spacious balcony overlooking courtyard widescreen tv free wifi location short pleasant walk heart town perfect safe quiet walking distance shops bars restaurants easy public transport town trolley tour location car visit san diego hotel fitted bill free shuttle service airport seaworld zoo help saved time money taxi bus fares im hotel renovations finished fairfield marriott love stay visit san diego

Reviews.Title: “Good Breakfast and Clean”
Reviews.Author: ypwalter
Reviews.Content: hotel marriott website looks remodel previous business window cant patio equipment clean facilities front desk little bit slow hotel bed sheet restroom worth mention offer real fruit real fruit juice package dont drink juice fountain machine 31 water juice

Reviews.Title: “Great New Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: lgrossbard
Reviews.Content: spot staying holiday inn express apparently changed name real treat changed hotel wow looking hotel free breakfast finally wifi worth extra money stay nice

Reviews.Title: “Good location for an end-of-trip stay”
Reviews.Author: Amanda S
Reviews.Content: stayed night 2011 hotel holiday inn express sounds lot changes im comment location chose stay town tail trip palm springs san diego locationwise hotel delivered found easy street parking hotel didnt move car morning time head airport dont afraid park street hotel easy walking distance plenty restaurants town historic park caught saturday market walked blocks explore houses heritage park
